user_instruction: 'Tell John to send me an email at sarah@cognitivegrowth.org summarizing our latest discussion on therapy methods and remind him to consult his Notion for the relevant information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. Sarah asked me to pass along a quick request: when you have a moment, could you please send her an email at sarah@cognitivegrowth.org summarizing your latest discussion on therapy methods? She also mentioned that you might want to consult your Notion notes to ensure all the relevant details are included.

Thanks so much!

Best,
[Your Name]

final_output:
